member.name: M:MSA.Phase2.OfficialAPI.Controllers.GenshinTeamController.AddMember(MSA.Phase2.OfficialAPI.Models.AddTeamMember)
member.summary: "CREATE Operation" Add Genshin Impact characters to a team assigned to a player.
member.returns: a JSON object of the current Genshin Team entered.

member.name: M:MSA.Phase2.OfficialAPI.Controllers.GenshinTeamController.GetCurrentTeam
member.summary: "READ Operation" Retrieves current Genshin Impact Teams to given player.
member.returns: a JSON object of the current Genshin Team of the player with a generated Id

member.name: M:MSA.Phase2.OfficialAPI.Controllers.GenshinTeamController.UpdateCurrentTeam(System.Guid,MSA.Phase2.OfficialAPI.Models.UpdateTeamMember)
member.summary: "UPDATE Operation" Add Genshin Impact characters to a team assigned to a player.
member.returns: a JSON object of the updated Genshin Team entered.

member.name: M:MSA.Phase2.OfficialAPI.Controllers.GenshinDevController.GetGenshinCharacters
member.summary: Retrieves the characters from the Genshin API
member.returns: A JSON object representing the genshin characters

member.name: M:MSA.Phase2.OfficialAPI.Controllers.GenshinDevController.GetGenshinCharacter(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves specific character from the Genshin API
member.returns: A JSON object of entered character
